Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max

Synopsis Determine the largest of two numeric values.
Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question 1.
The type of max(13, 16) is

Question 2.
The type of max(-16, 12.33454215456986400) is

Question 3. 
max(-8, -5) ==

Question 4. 
max(-13.704760875026398400, ) == 3.493961004716479600

Question 5. 
max(-3, ) == -3
